DOC.brief_summary: The goal propose intervention study increase proportion HIV positive HIV negative pregnant woman deliver facility , proportion HIV expose infant ( HEI ) receive nevirapine ( NVP ) within 48 hour delivery , proportion HEI bleed HIV polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) test within 8 week age .
DOC.brief_title: Supporting Attendance Facility Delivery Infant Health
DOC.detailed_description: Following formative phase I , propose phase II implement three-group cluster-randomized study test effectiveness short message service ( SMS ) reminder notification , [ mobile health mhealth ] ( group 1 ) combine effectiveness SMS reminders/notifications cash transfer ( group 2 ) compare standard prevention mother-to-child transmission ( HIV ) /maternal , neonatal child health , ( PMTCT/MNCH ) practice ( group 3 ) .
DOC.criteria: Known recently diagnose HIVpositive ANC ; Tested HIVnegative ANC Plans deliver facility catchment area 18 year older Able willing provide consent
